description: http://anidb.net/a5031 [Taimanin Asagi]`s main character. She is a female ninja from the http://anidb.net/ch27736 [Taimanin] (Anti-Demon Ninja) Igawa clan. She lost both of her parents early and now only has her sister, http://anidb.net/ch11299 [Sakura]. Ingenious at the martial art of fencing, she has speedily excelled her training, and is recognized from her achievements thus far as the strongest of those repelling the demon influence.
name: Igawa Asagi
